segments.text: Good morning , room reservations . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , my name is Peter . I have made a reservation for a single room from June 18th to June 21st . I'd like to make some changes . The reservation should only be to June 20th .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A single room from June 18th to 20th . Is that correct ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Do you need a limousine service ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's exactly what I want . How much does it charge ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A hundred and eighty yuan for one way . We have a counter at the airport where our representative will lead you to the car .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It sounds good . I'll take that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , sir . We look forward to serving you .
segments.speaker: S1
